text:
="preserve">Suzanne Tremblay (; January 24, 1937 – September 26, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was born in Montreal. He was a Bloc Québécois member of the House of Commons of Canada from 1993 to 2004. In 1997, she was Opposition House Leader for a short time.
Tremblay died on September 26, 2020 in Rimouski, Quebec from cancer, aged 83.
